name: LogRhythm
description: This plugin is used to ingest data to LogRhythm platform. To access the plugin, you would need the credentials of LogRhythm platform .

configuration.label: LogRhythm Server
configuration.description: IP address/FQDN of LogRhythm server in which data will be ingested.

configuration.label: LogRhythm Format
configuration.description: Data format required to ingest data.

configuration.label: LogRhythm Protocol
configuration.description: Protocol to be used while ingesting data.

configuration.label: LogRhythm Certificate
configuration.description: certificate is required only for TLS protocol.

configuration.label: Log Source Identifier
configuration.description: This will be added as prefix to all the logs. (The log source identifier should not contain the whitespace).
